description.value:
Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Melee charge
Target: One creature
Duration: Initiated grapple

Description

Discipline: Brutal Crocodile (Strike) You rush at your quarry and thrash yourself to them as they struggle to avoid you. Make a charge at the target, initiating a grapple attempt that does not provoke an attack of opportunity rather than making an attack. You receive a +2 bonus on this grapple attempt. On a success, you deal [[2d6]] points of damage to the target, and [[2d6]] points of damage every time you maintain a grapple. This damage stacks with that from the constrict special ability.
